body}addonsConfigurationErrorsCollection:addonsConfigurationErrorsCollection(limit:50,locale:\"en\"){items{genericError}}}componentSocConfigCollection:autoDeploySocCollection(limit:50,locale:\"en\"){items{entryTitle ResourceUeReturnModal{entryTitle header body returnPhone payUpfrontEdgeAmount returnPhoneDescription returnPhoneSummary
